title: 09/19/21: No more SIN number in the employee file
content: The Social Insurance Number (SIN) was formerly present in the employee file of Emprez. In order to preserve the security of this data of your employees, the Emprez administration has decided to no longer manage this information.Please note that this will in no way affect the management of schedules and time worked in Emprez as the social insurance number is not required information.Helpful?00Updated: 2 years ago Share :
